  https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10873449649051-Manuten%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-sinaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-gr%C3%A1fica-horizontal-vi%C3%A1ria
 * Clique em “Entrar e solicitar” ou em “Solicitar Anonimamente”

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Sim, você pode solicitar a repintura da faixa de pedestre.

Para pedir a manutenção da sinalização de trânsito, como a faixa de pedestre apagada, você pode usar a _Central 1746_.

_Como solicitar:_
1.  *Pelo Portal 1746*: Acesse o site _1746.rio_ e procure pelo serviço "Manutenção de sinalização gráfica horizontal viária". Você pode fazer o pedido com ou sem login.
2.  *Por telefone*: Ligue para o número _1746_. Se estiver fora do Rio, ligue para _(21) 3460-1746_.

_Ao registrar, informe:_
- O nome da rua e o número em frente à faixa.
- Detalhes sobre a faixa (se estava apagada, se sumiu, etc.).
- Se houve obra recente de asfalto no local.

É importante saber que este serviço é para _manutenção_ de faixas já existentes. O prazo de resposta é de até 14 dias.

**Scope [1] of the Service:**

task_data.prompt: bati o carro, mas ninguem se machucou, só amassou a lataria. preciso chamar a policia? ou da pra fazer o registro pela internet?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Você não precisa chamar a polícia* presencialmente. Para acidentes sem vítimas, registre seu Boletim de Registro de Acidente de Trânsito (e-BRAT) online:
 
 * Acesse *http://ebrat.pmerj.rj.gov.br/brat/*
 * Preencha e envie o formulário.
 * Imprima o comprovante.
 
 Se preferir, dirija-se a qualquer delegacia de polícia para registro presencial.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Se não houve feridos e o acidente causou apenas danos materiais, você _não precisa_ chamar a polícia.

Você pode registrar o acidente online pelo sistema *e-BRAT (Boletim de Registro de Acidente de Trânsito)* da Polícia Militar do RJ.

_Como funciona:_
- Acesse o site oficial: _http://ebrat.pmerj.rj.gov.br/brat/_
- Preencha o formulário com os detalhes do acidente, incluindo dados dos veículos e do ocorrido.
- É possível anexar fotos.
- O registro pode ser feito em até _90 dias_ após o acidente e é _gratuito_.

Este serviço é exclusivo para acidentes sem vítimas e ocorridos em vias estaduais.

Gostaria de mais detalhes sobre como preencher o e-BRAT?

**Research Topic:** registro de acidente de trânsito online Rio de Janeiro

**Summary:**

In Rio de Janeiro, the online registration of traffic accidents without victims is facilitated through the e-BRAT system, a web-based tool managed by the State Military Police (PMERJ). [1] This system allows citizens involved in traffic accidents without injuries to submit information online for validation and subsequent issuance of a Boletim de Registro de Acidente de Trânsito (BRAT).
 [1]
**Key Information and Procedures:**

*   **System:** The e-BRAT (Boletim de Registro de Acidente de Trânsito) system is the designated platform for online registration of traffic accidents that do not involve any victims.
* [1]   **Eligibility:** The service is available to all residents of the State of Rio de Janeiro who were involved in an accident that did not result in injuries and occurred on a state road.
* [2]   **Accessing the Service:** To register an accident, users must access the e-BRAT website at http://ebrat.pmerj.rj.gov.br/brat/.
* [2]   **Process:**
    1.  Access the e-BRAT website and agree to the instructions.
  [2]   2.  Fill out the form with details related to the accident to initiate the registration.
  [2]   3.  The system allows for the registration of accidents involving up to four vehicles.
  [3]   4.  Information such as vehicle license plates, Renavam numbers, vehicle types, and state of origin are required.
  [3]   5.  Details about the accident dynamics, location (e.g., intersection, rotatory), visibility, and type of accident must be provided.
  [3]   6.  Users can attach photos of the accident.
  [3]   7.  The system allows for the option to receive the registration protocol number via email for tracking.
* [3]   **Timeframe for Registration:** Citizens have up to 90 days after the accident to complete the e-BRAT registration.
* [2]   **Cost:** The e-BRAT service is free of charge.
* [2]   **Consultation:** The e-BRAT system also allows users to consult previously submitted accident reports using a protocol number. The [3] consultation service is available online 24 hours a day.
* [3]   **Limitations:** The e-BRAT system is exclusively for accidents without victims and those occurring on state roads. Accidents with victims require seeking the nearest police station, and accidents on federal highways fall under the jurisdiction of the Federal Highway Police. The [2] system also cannot process accidents involving more than five vehicles.

 [4]**Official Sources:**

*   The e-BRAT system is managed by the Secretaria de Estado de Polícia Militar (State Military Police).
*  [1]  Information is also available through the Governo do Estado do Rio de Janeiro portal.
*  [2]  The Carioca Digital portal also references the e-BRAT system for accident registration.
*  [4]  The Polícia Civil (Civil Police) also has a "Delegacia Online" for pre-registration of occurrences, but for traffic accidents with victims, it directs users to the nearest police station or to the e-BRAT site for accidents without victims. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [sepm.rj.gov.br](https://sepm.rj.gov.br/e-brat/)
 - [2] [www.rj.gov.br](https://www.rj.gov.br/servico/fazer-o-boletim-de-registro-de-acidente-de-transito-sem-vitimas-e-brat159)
 - [3] [www.rj.gov.br](https://www.rj.gov.br/servico/consultar-boletim-de-registro-de-acidente-de-transito-sem-vitimas-e-brat48)
 - [4] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/solicitacao-de-emissao-de-brat-em-acidente-de-transito-sem-vitima/)

task_data.prompt: quero trabalhar com van escolar. o que eu preciso pra conseguir a autorização da prefeitura? o carro tem que ter o que?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Para autorização*:
 
 * Cópia da identidade, CPF, CNH categoria D, comprovante de inscrição no INSS como motorista, comprovante de residência no Município do Rio de Janeiro, certidões negativas da 2ª Vara Cível e da Justiça Federal, declaração de local de guarda dos veículos, requerimento à SMTR com telefone e e-mail, documento do veículo em nome do requerente, atestado médico de não portar doença infectocontagiosa, CSV (se houve alteração) e apólice de seguro em favor de terceiros
  Link direto: https://carioca.rio/servicos/autorizacao-para-transporte-escolar-abertura-de-termo/
 
 *Para inclusão de veículo*:
 
 * Requerimento assinado, cópia da identidade, CRLV em nome do requerente (ou CRV/nota fiscal), apólice de seguro (Danos Materiais R\$ 25.000, APP R\$ 5.000 por passageiro) e CSV (se alterado)
  Link direto: https://carioca.rio/servicos/inclusao-de-veiculos-em-modais-de-transporte/
 
 *Veículo*:
 
 * Placa vermelha; faixa amarela de 40 cm nas laterais e traseira com “ESCOLAR” em preto; número de autorização fixado; selo de vistoria; cartão de identificação no para-brisa; tacógrafo aferido; CNH D válida; CRLV atualizado; idade máxima de 7 anos para vans

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para trabalhar com van escolar no Rio, você precisa da autorização da Prefeitura, emitida pela Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR). O processo envolve credenciar o veículo e o motorista, com vistorias semestrais.

_O que o carro precisa ter:_
- Placa vermelha e faixa amarela de 40cm com a palavra "ESCOLAR".
- Número de autorização e selo da vistoria visíveis.
- CRLV atualizado.
- CSV (se modificado).
- Comprovante de propriedade ou contrato de leasing.
- Seguro de responsabilidade civil.
- DPVAT pago.
- Declaração do local de guarda do veículo.

_O que o motorista precisa ter:_
- CNH categoria D, válida e com "Exerce Atividade Remunerada".
- Idade mínima de 21 anos.
- Curso especializado de transporte escolar.
- Certidões negativas criminais (estadual e federal).
- Atestado médico de ausência de doenças infecciosas.

Você pode iniciar o processo pelo _Portal Carioca Digital_ ou ligando para o _1746_. É fundamental estar em dia com multas, pois veículos com débitos não são vistoriados.

Gostaria que eu te ajudasse com o contato do _1746_? ✅

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 9, 2025

**Research Topic:** Authorization requirements for school vans (van escolar) in Rio de Janeiro.

To obtain authorization for operating a school van in Rio de Janeiro, operators must meet several requirements related to the vehicle, the driver, and the operational procedures, as mandated by the Municipal Secretariat of Transport (SMTR) [1]. The process involves credencing both the vehicle and the driver, with mandatory vehicle inspections conducted every six months [1].

**Vehicle Requirements:**
*   **Identification:** Vehicles must have a red license plate and a yellow stripe, 40 cm wide, along the entire length of the sides and rear, with the word "ESCOLAR" in black [1]. The authorization number must be visibly fixed on the vehicle, along with an annual inspection sticker and an identification card for the authorized operator/auxiliary displayed on the windshield [1].
*   **Documentation:**
    *   Certificate of Registration and Licensing of the Vehicle (CRLV) must be up-to-date [1].
    *   If the vehicle has undergone modifications, a Vehicle Safety Certificate (CSV) is required [2].
    *   Proof of ownership, such as the CRLV or an invoice in the company's name, is necessary. For leased vehicles, a copy of the leasing contract is required [2].
    *   A copy of the civil liability insurance policy in the company's name is mandatory, covering death per passenger (R$ 5,000.00 or total capacity), permanent disability per passenger (R$ 5,000.00 or total capacity), and material damage (minimum R$ 25,000.00) [2]. For individuals, the insurance must be in their name with similar coverage [2].
    *   Proof of payment of the vehicle's mandatory insurance (DPVAT) is required [3].
    *   For companies, proof of at least 50% of the share capital integration in relation to the fleet is needed [2].
    *   A declaration of the vehicle's storage location, on company letterhead, is required [2].
*   **Inspection:** Vehicles are subject to mandatory inspections every six months to verify safety items, including the tachograph [1]. For the inspection, a vistoria appointment confirmation, proof of payment for the Municipal Collection Document (DARM), an updated tachograph calibration certificate, and a regularized cadastral status report are needed [1].

**Driver and Auxiliary Requirements:**
*   **Driver's License:** The driver must possess a National Driver's License (CNH) in Category D, which must be valid and indicate that the driver engages in remunerated activity [1]. The minimum age for drivers is 21 years [4].
*   **Training:** A certificate of completion for a specialized course in school transportation is required for the authorized operator/permissionary and any auxiliaries [1].
*   **Criminal Records:** Original negative certificates from the 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th Criminal Distribution Registry Offices are required, with a maximum of 90 days from the application date [2]. A certificate of no record from the Federal Justice is also necessary [2].
*   **Health:** A medical certificate stating the absence of infectious diseases is required [2].
*   **Auxiliary Personnel:** If an auxiliary is employed, their identification card must be displayed with the windshield [1]. For the removal of an auxiliary, specific documentation and procedures must be followed at SMTR protocol centers [4].

**Operational and Legal Requirements:**
*   **Authorization:** The process for obtaining authorization is managed by the Municipal Secretariat of Transport (SMTR) [1]. Applications can be initiated through the Carioca Digital Portal or by contacting the 1746 service [2].
*   **Regulations:** The service is governed by various decrees and resolutions, including Decree Rio No. 38.363/2014, which establishes the regulations for school transportation services in Rio de Janeiro [2]. A proposed bill (PL nº 817/2025) aims to consolidate and update these rules for greater safety and efficiency. [1]
*   **Fines and Penalties:** Vehicles must not have overdue fines, which must be settled before the inspection. [3] The SMTR monitors infractions, and accumulating points can lead to suspension and mandatory retraining. [5] Transporting students in unaccredited vehicles is considered clandestine and subject to immediate vehicle removal and fines. [1]
*   **Vehicle Capacity:** Vehicles must have a minimum capacity of eight passengers, and the service can be offered via buses, minibuses, and other vehicles meeting these criteria. [1]

For specific inquiries or to initiate the process, citizens can contact the 1746 service or visit the relevant sections of the Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro's official websites. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [prefeitura.rio](https://transportes.prefeitura.rio/transporte-escolar/)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/autorizacao-para-transporte-escolar-abertura-de-termo/)
 - [3] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/grupo/permissao-de-transporte-escolar/)
 - [4] [starcorretoradeseguros.com.br](https://starcorretoradeseguros.com.br/o-que-precisa-para-dirigir-van-escolar-veja-os-requisitos/)
 - [5] [escolartransporte.com.br](https://www.escolartransporte.com.br/informacoes-uteis/como-legalizar-um-transporte-escolar/)

task_data.prompt: tenho uma van e quero fazer transporte de funcionario pra uma empresa. qual a licença que eu preciso tirar?

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para fazer transporte de funcionários com sua van no Rio de Janeiro, você precisará de uma licença da _Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR)_, na categoria de _Fretamento_.

_Importante:_
- Geralmente, esse tipo de serviço exige que você tenha uma _pessoa jurídica_ (empresa, cooperativa ou associação).
- Sua van precisará ter _placa vermelha_ e passar por _vistoria anual_.
- O motorista deve ter _CNH categoria D_ e _curso de transporte coletivo_.

_Como solicitar:_
Você pode solicitar a autorização pelo _Portal Carioca Digital_ ou presencialmente em uma _Coordenadoria Regional de Transporte (CRT)_.

Para mais informações e detalhes sobre a documentação, você pode consultar o _Portal 1746_ ou o _carioca.rio_.

Você gostaria de mais detalhes sobre os documentos necessários para a empresa ou para o veículo?

content.name: google_search
content.arguments: {'query': 'licença para transporte de funcionários van Rio de Janeiro'}

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Licensing for Van Transport Services in Rio de Janeiro**

**Date of Search:** August 9, 2025

**Research Topic:** Licensing for employee transport via vans in Rio de Janeiro.

**Executive Summary:**
The Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) is the primary municipal body responsible for regulating transport services in Rio de Janeiro. While a specific licensing category for "employee transport" was not explicitly identified in the search results, the "Fretamento" (chartering/hiring) service appears to be the most relevant category for van-based group transportation, which could include employee transport. Operating such a service generally requires a legal entity (company, association, or cooperative) registered with the SMTR, adherence to specific vehicle and driver requirements, and a formal application process. State-level regulations for "transporte executivo" are handled by DETRO RJ and may differ.

**Detailed Findings:**

**1. Governing Authority:**
The Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) is the municipal body responsible for the regulation and oversight of various transport modalities within the city of Rio de Janeiro, including fretamento, vans under STPL (Sistema de Transporte Público Local) and TEC (Transporte Especial Complementar). [1]

**2. Relevant Service Category: Fretamento**
The "Fretamento" service is described as the modality for vehicles transporting passengers for tourism and events. [1] This service utilizes vans, buses, and microbuses and operates on a point-to-point basis, not for "lotada" (shared rides). [2] While not explicitly termed "employee transport," this is the closest municipal category for group van transport.

**3. Legal Entity Requirement:**
To operate a "fretamento" service, a legal entity such as a company, association, or cooperative must be legally constituted and registered with the SMTR. Direct operation by individuals is generally not permitted unless they are affiliated with a legal entity. [2]

**4. Application and Licensing Process:**
*   **Registration:** All legally constituted cooperatives or companies providing "fretamento" services must be registered with the SMTR. [2]
*   **Application Channels:** Applications can typically be submitted virtually through the "Portal Carioca Digital" or in person at a "Coordenadoria Regional de Transporte (CRT)". [3] The municipal service center, 1746, can also provide information and assist with requests. [3]
*   **Expected Processing Time:** The expected timeframe for obtaining authorization and the certificate of assent is approximately 30 business days after the application is submitted. [4]

**5. Documentation Requirements for Legal Entities (Fretamento):**
The following documentation is generally required for the opening of a "Termo" (authorization) for "Transporte Fretamento":
*   A formal request (Requerimento) for accreditation in the "fretamento" regime. [5]
*   The company's articles of incorporation (Contrato social), including any amendments, duly registered, with the social objective of passenger transport. [5]
*   Proof of vehicle ownership, such as the Certificado de Registro do Veículo (CRV) or Certificado de Registro e Licenciamento do Veículo (CRLV).
* [5]   Proof of property ownership or a lease agreement for premises within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro.
* [5]   Cadastro Nacional de Pessoa Jurídica (CNPJ).
*  [5]  An establishment permit (Alvará do estabelecimento).
*   [5] Company logomarks (4 logomarcas measuring 20x50 cm with white background).
*   [5] Photographs of an already stickered vehicle (16 photos, 4 from each angle: front, left side, right side, rear).
*   [5] Proof of vehicle storage location (e.g., a utility bill or a declaration).
*   [5] A "Nada Consta da SMTR" document, confirming no outstanding fines, available on the SMTR website.

**6 [5]. Vehicle Requirements:**
*   **Identification:** Authorized vans must display a red license plate (Placa Vermelha), indicating a "LICENÇA de veículo de ALUGUEL" (rental vehicle license), and bear an annual inspection sticker (Selo de Vistoria Anual).
*   * [1]*Vehicle Lifespan:** SMTR establishes regulations for vehicle lifespan. For instance, vans in the STPC (Serviço de Transporte de Passageiro Complementar Comunitário) service have a lifespan of 15 years from the date of manufacture, provided they are in good condition.
*   **Financial [3] Standing:** There should be no outstanding fines. Any existing fines must be settled at least five business days before the document inspection process begins.
*   **Inspection [4] and Fees:** Payment of the Documento de Arrecadação Municipal (DARM) is required at least five business days before the scheduled inspection date. Inspections [4] must be scheduled through the SMTR website.

**7. Driver [4] and Auxiliary Requirements:**
*   **Driver's License:** Drivers must possess a Carteira Nacional de Habilitação (CNH) of category D, which must be valid and indicate the exercise of remunerated activity.
*   **Specialized [1] Training:** A certificate of completion for a specialization course in collective transport is required for both the authorized permit holder and any auxiliary personnel.

**8. State [1]-Level Regulations (DETRO RJ):**
For "transporte executivo de passageiros," the state-level Departamento Estadual de Transportes Rodoviários (DETRO RJ) is responsible for authorization and registration. Vehicles must belong to an authorized legal entity based in Rio de Janeiro State and have a maximum age of 10 years from the year of manufacture. This is distinct [1] from municipal licensing.

**Conclusion:**
Individuals or companies seeking to operate van transport services for employees in Rio de Janeiro should investigate the "Fretamento" category through the SMTR. The process involves establishing a legal entity, gathering specific documentation, ensuring vehicles meet SMTR's requirements, and submitting an application via the designated municipal channels. Information regarding a distinct municipal licensing category specifically for "employee transport" was not found, with "fretamento" being the most relevant service for group van transportation.

**Sources:**
 - [1] [alerj.rj.gov.br](http://www3.alerj.rj.gov.br/lotus_notes/default.asp?id=3&url=L3NjcHJvMTkyMy5uc2YvMGM1YmY1Y2RlOTU2MDFmOTAzMjU2Y2FhMDAyMzEzMWIvNmI0MTViMTljZDRlMjdkNjAzMjU4ODlmMDA1ODM1ZDU/T3BlbkRvY3VtZW50)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/objetivo/solicitar-autorizacao-de-transporte/)
 - [3] [www.gov.br](https://www.gov.br/pt-br/servicos/obter-termo-de-autorizacao-para-prestar-servico-de-transporte-rodoviario-coletivo-interestadual-e-internacional-de-passageiros-regime-de-autorizacao)
 - [4] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/autorizacao-para-transporte-fretamento-para-pessoa-fisica/)
 - [5] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10871328761115-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-o-servi%C3%A7o-de-transporte-fretamento-turismo-eventos)

task_data.prompt: quero começar a rodar de uber. é verdade que precisa se cadastrar na prefeitura? como faz isso?
task_data.golden_answer:
Sim, para rodar de Uber na cidade é obrigatório credenciar-se junto à Prefeitura (SMTR) – *o credenciamento é gratuito e válido por 12 meses* Você pode:
 
 * Pela internet: acesse https://carioca.rio/servicos, faça login com Identidade Carioca ou conta Gov.Br, busque “Credenciamento de motoristas de aplicativos”, clique em ACESSAR O SERVIÇO e preencha o formulário.
 
 * Presencialmente: compareça a um posto de atendimento da SMTR (consulte endereços em https://transportes.prefeitura.rio).
 
 Mais detalhes: https://prefeitura.rio/transportes/prefeitura-do-rio-publica-regras-de-credenciamento-de-aplicativos-e-motoristas

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Sim, para rodar de Uber no Rio de Janeiro, é necessário fazer um _credenciamento_ junto à Prefeitura, através da Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR).

_Como fazer:_
Você pode realizar o credenciamento de forma gratuita:
- Presencialmente, em um _ponto de atendimento da SMTR_.
- Online.

_Requisitos importantes:_
- Sua CNH deve ser permanente (não PPD) e ter a observação _\"Exerce Atividade Remunerada - EAR\"_.
- O veículo precisa ter 4 portas, no mínimo 5 lugares e ar-condicionado.

O credenciamento tem a mesma validade da sua CNH.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 9, 2025

**Research Topic:** Cadastro motorista Uber prefeitura rio de janeiro

**Summary:**

In Rio de Janeiro, the municipal government, through the Municipal Secretariat of Transport (SMTR), has established regulations for ride-sharing services, including Uber drivers. As of March 2021, a joint resolution published in the Official Gazette mandated public accreditation for both ride-sharing companies and their drivers to ensure effective municipal oversight [1].

**Driver Accreditation Requirements:**

*   **Mandatory Accreditation:** Drivers providing paid individual passenger transport services in the city are required to be accredited [1].
*   **Accreditation Validity:** The driver's accreditation is valid for the same duration as their National Driver's License (CNH) [1].
*   **Application Process:** Drivers can choose to complete their free accreditation either at an SMTR service point or online [1].
*   **Information Provided by Platforms:** Ride-sharing platforms are required to submit monthly operational data to the SMTR, including:
    *   Full name of partner drivers.
    *   CNH number and its validity for partner drivers.
    *   License plate of vehicles used by partner drivers for at least one trip in the municipality in the preceding month.
    *   A declaration of conformity, confirming that drivers meet all requirements stipulated in Article 3 of Decree Rio No. 48.612 of March 15, 2021 [1].
    *   The total amount charged to passengers for trips made in the immediately preceding month by registered drivers [1].

**Driver Requirements for Uber:**

To operate as an Uber driver, individuals must meet specific criteria:

*   **CNH:** A National Driver's License (CNH) is required, with categories AB, AC, AD, AE, B, C, D, or E accepted. Crucially, the CNH must include the annotation "Exerce Atividade Remunerada - EAR" (Engages in Remunerated Activity). A temporary driving permit (PPD) is not accepted; only a permanent CNH is valid [1].
*   **Vehicle Registration:** The vehicle's Certificate of Registration and Licensing (CRLV) must be submitted. The Uber platform specifies that vehicles must have 4 doors, seating for at least 5 people, and air conditioning. Vehicles must also be within a certain age limit, though specific age limits can vary by municipality and are subject to local regulations [1]. Vehicles with "ALUGUEL" (rental) category, "FANTASIA" (fantasy) color, or those that are damaged or have circulation restrictions are not accepted [1].
*   **Safety Verification:** Uber uses CNH information to verify driver eligibility [1].
*   **Digital Documents:** Drivers can access their CNH and CRLV digitally through the Carteira Digital de Trânsito (CDT) app, which is linked to the federal government's gov.br platform. [1]

**Municipal Regulations and Fees:**

*   **Usage Fee:** As of March 2021, a decree by the Mayor of Rio de Janeiro mandates that ride-sharing platforms like Uber and 99 pay a monthly fee of 1.5% of their revenue from trips within the city. This fee is intended to cover the intensive use of public roads and is directed to the Municipal Fund for Sustainable Urban Mobility. [1] This fee is paid by the companies, not the drivers. [2]
*   **Comitê para Estudos e Regulamentação Viária de Aplicativos (Cerva):** This committee was established to oversee and update regulations for ride-sharing services, including price changes and accreditation requirements.

**Other [1] Relevant Information:**

*   **Vehicle Rental:** For individuals who do not own a suitable vehicle, Uber partners with rental companies that offer discounts for drivers.
*   [1] **Mototaxi Regulation:** Separately, the Rio de Janeiro Prefecture launched the Moto.Rio app to legalize and regulate mototaxi services, emphasizing no fees for drivers. [2]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/transportes/prefeitura-do-rio-publica-regras-de-credenciamento-de-aplicativos-e-motoristas/)
 - [2] [brasildefato.com.br](https://www.brasildefato.com.br/2023/03/17/prefeitura-do-rio-lanca-aplicativo-para-servico-de-mototaxi-sem-cobranca-de-taxa/)

task_data.prompt: tem umas vans piratas rodando aqui no bairro, pegando passageiro. como eu denuncio?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para denunciar vans piratas no seu bairro, acesse o Portal 1746 da Prefeitura:
 
 https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/14208432518043-Fiscaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-do-transporte-complementar-Vans-e-Kombi
 
 Selecione *Transporte Especial Complementar – TEC* e informe:
 
 * Placa e/ou número de permissão do veículo
 * Local do fato
 * Dia e horário da ocorrência
 
 *Prazo de atendimento:* até 20 dias

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Você pode denunciar vans piratas através da _Central 1746_, o canal oficial da Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro.

_Como denunciar:_
- *Telefone:* Ligue para o número _1746_.
- *Online:* Acesse o site _1746.rio_ ou use o aplicativo.
- *WhatsApp:* Envie uma mensagem para o número da Central 1746.

Ao fazer a denúncia, forneça o máximo de detalhes possível, como:
- _Data e hora_ da ocorrência.
- _Local_ exato (rua, número, bairro).
- Se possível, o _número de ordem_ ou a _placa_ do veículo.

Sua denúncia pode ser feita de forma _anônima_.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 9, 2025

**Research Topic:** Denunciar transporte irregular Rio de Janeiro vans piratas

To report irregular transportation, specifically "vans piratas" (pirate vans), in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the municipal government's central atendimento channel, 1746 [1]. This service is available via telephone, WhatsApp, application, or website [1]. When making a report, it is crucial to provide specific details such as the date, time, location, and the vehicle's order number or license plate [1].

The Municipal Secretariat of Transport (SMTR) is responsible for regulating various transport modalities, including vans used in the Local Public Transport System (STPL) and the Complementary Special Transport (TEC) [1]. The SMTR conducts daily operations and planned fiscalizations across the city to combat irregularities in passenger transport, including pirate vans [1]. Vehicles found to be operating irregularly or in poor condition are subject to removal and fines [1]. For instance, vans can be removed for being in poor condition, lacking annual inspection, or having irregular documentation [1].

The 1746 service is a comprehensive platform for citizen inquiries, services, and denunciations related to municipal services, including transportation [2]. The Carioca Digital portal also offers services related to transportation, including the fiscalization of irregular transport [3]. The Municipal Secretariat of Public Order (SEOP) and its Special Coordination of Complementary Transport (CETC) are also involved in these fiscalization efforts [4].

For inter-municipal transport, the State Agency for Transport Regulation (AGETRANSP) also has an "Ouvidoria" (Ombudsman) for complaints, accessible via telephone and email [1]. The State Secretariat of Transport and Urban Mobility (Setram) also provides contact information for its Ombudsman [5].

In summary, the primary and most direct channel for reporting pirate vans within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro is through the 1746 service, which collects information to support the fiscalization efforts of the relevant secretariats [1].

**Sources:**

 - [2] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/14208432518043-Fiscaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-do-transporte-complementar-Vans-e-Kombi)

task_data.prompt: sou taxista e minha autonomia vai vencer. o que eu preciso fazer pra renovar o alvará?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Para renovar seu alvará*:
 
 * Acesse o serviço de Vistoria Anual em Transporte Táxi no Portal Carioca Digital: https://carioca.rio/servicos/vistoria-anual-em-transporte-taxi/
 * Faça login com Identidade Carioca ou conta Gov.Br.
 * Emita a guia DARM de *Vistoria Anual*, agende a vistoria e pague a taxa.
 * Compareça na data marcada no posto (Estrada do Guerenguê, 1.630 – Taquara) com:
 
  * CRLV atualizado
  * CNH válida com informação de atividade remunerada
  * Laudo de Situação Cadastral (http://sgtu.rio.rj.gov.br/portalsmtr/index)
  * Certificado de aferição do taxímetro (IPEM)
  * Apólice de seguro (R\$ 5 000 pessoal; R\$ 25 000 material)
 * Em até 48 h, seu novo CIAT (alvará) será emitido.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para renovar o alvará de taxista no Rio de Janeiro, o processo envolve duas etapas principais:

1.  _Peticionamento Eletrônico (Online)_:
    *   Acesse o portal oficial da Prefeitura: _carioca.rio/servicos/vistoria-anual-em-transporte-taxi/_
    *   Faça login com sua Identidade Carioca ou Gov.Br.
    *   Selecione o serviço de vistoria (regular, atrasada ou atualização documental).
    *   Informe o número do alvará e a placa do veículo.
    *   Anexe os documentos solicitados em PDF (limite de 10 Mb por arquivo).

2.  _Atendimento Presencial_:
    *   Após o peticionamento online, agende um horário.
    *   Compareça ao local agendado com a confirmação e todos os documentos que você anexou online.

_Documentos necessários (gerais)_:
- Comprovante de pagamento do DARM da vistoria.
- CRLV atualizado.
- Certificado de calibração do taxímetro (IPEM-RJ).
- CNH com 2 anos de emissão e EAR.
- Certidões criminais (estadual e federal).
- Certificado do curso de taxista.
- Comprovante de residência (até 90 dias) ou declaração.
- Comprovante de inscrição no INSS como taxista.
- Certidões negativas de distribuição (2º Ofício e Justiça Federal).

Você precisa quitar multas pendentes pelo menos 5 dias úteis antes de iniciar o processo.

Para te ajudar, você gostaria que eu verificasse o calendário de vistoria anual para táxis, informando o final da placa do seu veículo?

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Renewal of Taxi Driver Permit (Alvará) in Rio de Janeiro**

**Date of Search:** August 9, 2025

The process for renewing a taxi driver's permit (alvará) in Rio de Janeiro involves a two-stage procedure: an online application followed by an in-person visit for vehicle inspection and document verification. The Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) is the responsible municipal body overseeing these procedures and establishing the annual calendar for inspections and renewals.
 [1]
**Renewal Process:**

1.  **Online Application (Peticionamento Eletrônico):**
    *   Access the official portal at `carioca.rio/servicos/vistoria-anual-em-transporte-taxi/`.
  [2]   *   Log in using your Identidade Carioca or Gov.Br account.
  [2]   *   Select the appropriate service: "Vistoria atrasada," "Vistoria regular," or "Atualização documental".
    [2] *   Provide the taxi permit number and the vehicle's license plate.
    [2] *   Attach all required documents in PDF format, with a maximum file size of 10 Mb.
    [2] *   Acknowledge the terms of use and confirm that electronic notifications will be sent to the registered email address.

2. [2]  **In-Person Appointment:**
    *   Schedule an appointment through the designated platform, typically found at `sgtu.rio.rj.gov.br/AgendarVistoriaSMTR/Index`.
    [2] *   Attend the scheduled appointment at an SEOP/SETT service point. Bring the appointment confirmation and all the documents previously submitted online.

**Required [2] Documents:**

The following documents are generally required for the renewal process:
*   Proof of payment for the Documento de Arrecadação Municipal (DARM) for the annual or late inspection.
*   Certificate [1] of Registration and Licensing of Vehicle (CRLV) updated for the current year.
*   Certificate [1] of taximeter calibration issued by the Instituto de Pesos e Medidas do Estado do Rio de Janeiro (IPEM-RJ), updated according to the institute's calendar.
*   National [1] Driver's License (CNH) with a minimum of 2 years of issuance and indicating the exercise of remunerated activity.
*   State [1] and Federal criminal certificates.
*   Taxi [1] driver course certificate.
*   Proof [1] of residence (issued within the last 90 days) or a declaration of residence.
*   INSS [1] registration as a taxi driver.
*   Negative [1] certificate from the 2nd Office of Distribution Registry of the Capital.
*   Negative [1] certificate from Federal Justice.
*   If [1] the permit is rented, the CPF of the permit holder must be provided.
*   For [3] representatives, a power of attorney or other proof of legal representation is mandatory.

**Payment [1] and Fees:**

A DARM must be paid for the "Vistoria Anual" or "Anual Atrasada" to cover the inspection and renewal fees. It is [3] important to ensure all outstanding fines are settled at least five business days before initiating the renewal process.

**2025 [4] Calendar and Biennial Inspection:**

The Prefeitura do Rio has released the calendar for the 2025 Mandatory Annual Inspection for taxis. While [1] specific dates based on license plate endings for 2025 are not fully detailed in the provided snippets, the SMTR establishes this schedule. It is [1] important to note that vehicles up to ten years old may be subject to a biennial inspection for the 2025/2026 period, as per Municipal Law Nº 8590/2024, though document updates are still required. The SMTR [4] is responsible for issuing resolutions that detail these requirements. [4]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [eitaxi.com.br](https://eitaxi.com.br/prefeitura-do-rio-divulga-calendario-da-vistoria-anual-obrigatoria-2025-para-taxis/)
 - [2] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/transportes/prefeitura-divulga-calendario-de-vistoria-anual-para-veiculos-do-sistema-de-transporte-publico-municipal/)
 - [3] [legisweb.com.br](https://www.legisweb.com.br/legislacao/?id=472786)
 - [4] [legisweb.com.br](https://www.legisweb.com.br/legislacao/?id=472785)

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para renovar a licença da sua van e agendar a vistoria no Rio de Janeiro, o processo é feito pela Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) e envolve os seguintes passos:

_Como renovar e agendar a vistoria:_
1.  _Petição Eletrônica_: Inicie o processo no _Portal Carioca Digital_.
2.  _Agendamento_: Agende a vistoria física através do sistema, que pode ser acessado pelo _Portal Carioca Digital_ ou pontos de serviço da SMTR.
3.  _Pagamento_: Pague as taxas (DARM) com antecedência, no mínimo 5 dias úteis antes da vistoria.
4.  _Vistoria_: Compareça com a van e os documentos no dia e hora agendados.

_Documentos necessários para a vistoria:_
- Comprovante de agendamento
- Comprovante de pagamento do DARM do ano
- Certificado atualizado do cronotacógrafo (com cópia)
- CRLV atual
- CNH válida (categoria D, com atividade remunerada)
- Certificado do curso especializado em transporte coletivo
- Laudo de Situação Cadastral (emitido pelo site da SMTR)

Para mais detalhes, acesse o _Portal Carioca Digital_ (carioca.rio) ou o site da SMTR (transportes.prefeitura.rio).

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 9, 2025

**Research Topic:** Renovação de licença de van no Rio de Janeiro, com foco na vistoria.

**Summary:**
The renewal of a van license in Rio de Janeiro, particularly for commercial transport operations such as those under the Sistema de Transporte Público Local (STPL), involves a mandatory annual vehicle inspection (vistoria) and adherence to specific documentation and procedural requirements. The Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) is the primary municipal body overseeing these regulations, with services often managed through the Portal Carioca Digital.

**Vehicle Inspection (Vistoria) Requirements for STPL Vans:**
Vans operating within the STPL system are required to undergo an annual inspection to ensure compliance with transport regulations. The [1] process necessitates the presentation of several documents:
*   **Proof of Appointment:** A confirmed appointment for the vistoria must be provided.
*  [1]  **Proof of Payment:** Evidence of payment for the Municipal Collection Document (DARM) for the relevant year is required. This payment must be made at least five business days prior to the scheduled inspection date.
*  [1]  **Cronotachograph Certificate:** An updated calibration certificate for the cronotachograph, along with a copy, is necessary.
*  [1]  **Vehicle Registration and Licensing Certificate (CRLV):** The CRLV must be current.
*  [1]  **National Driver's License (CNH):** A valid CNH, category D, indicating remunerated activity, is mandatory for the authorized person or permit holder.
*  [1]  **Specialized Course Certificate:** A certificate confirming completion of a specialized course in collective transport, for both the permit holder and their assistant, must be presented.
*  [1]  **Cadastral Situation Report:** A regular Cadastral Situation Report (Laudo de Situação Cadastral), obtainable from the SMTR website, is also required.

**License [2] Renewal Process:**
The renewal of a van's operational license or permit typically involves a multi-step process managed through municipal digital platforms:
1.  **Electronic Petition:** Operators are generally required to initiate the process by submitting an electronic petition via the Portal Carioca Digital. This usually requires logging in using a Carioca Identity or a Gov.Br account.
2.   [3]**Appointment Scheduling:** Following the electronic submission, an appointment for the physical vehicle inspection must be scheduled through the designated system, often linked to the Portal Carioca Digital or specific SMTR service points.
3.   [3]**Payment of Fees:** Applicable fees, often paid via DARM, must be settled in advance of the inspection date.
4.   [1]**Physical Inspection:** The vehicle and all supporting documentation must be presented at the scheduled appointment for the inspection to be conducted.

For [3] businesses operating vans, the renewal of an "alvará de funcionamento" (business operating license) also utilizes the Carioca Digital portal and involves fee payments and potentially prior location consultations.

It is [4] recommended that van operators consult the official Portal Carioca Digital or contact the Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) directly for the most up-to-date and specific procedures regarding license renewal and inspection scheduling.

**Sources:**
 - [1] [prefeitura.rio](https://transportes.prefeitura.rio/stpl-2/)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/vistoria-anual-em-transporte-taxi/)
 - [3] [marica.rj.gov.br](https://www.marica.rj.gov.br/noticia/prefeitura-de-marica-realiza-vistoria-de-vans-a-partir-de-04-09/)
 - [4] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/grupo/vistoria-de-permissionario-de-transporte/)

task_data.golden_answer:
*TAXI.RIO – Suporte para taxistas*
 
 * Clique em “Fale Conosco” em https://taxi.rio/contato-2 para abrir um chamado.
 * Ou envie e‑mail para *taxi.rio@prefeitura.rio* com seu nº RATR, telefone, modelo do celular e descrição do problema de GPS.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para resolver problemas com o GPS do aplicativo _Taxi.Rio_, você pode entrar em contato com o suporte pelos seguintes canais:

1.  _Pelo próprio aplicativo:_
    Acesse o menu (canto superior esquerdo) e selecione a opção "_Fale conosco_".

2.  _Chat online:_
    No aplicativo, clique no botão "_Fale conosco_", geralmente no canto inferior direito. O chat funciona de segunda a sexta, das 9h às 17h.

3.  _Por e-mail:_
    Envie um e-mail para _iplanrio@rio.rj.gov.br_. Ao enviar por e-mail, você receberá um número de protocolo para acompanhar o seu caso.

Você também pode contatar a _Central 1746_, que atende serviços gerais da Prefeitura, incluindo os relacionados a táxis:
- Ligue para _1746_ (dentro do Rio).
- Ligue para _(21) 3460-1746_ (de outras localidades).

Espero que consiga resolver o problema rapidamente! ✅

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 9, 2025

**Topic:** How to complain about a taxi driver in Rio de Janeiro.

To file a complaint against a taxi driver in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the city's official channels, primarily the 1746 service. This service acts as a central point for citizen atendimento and allows for the reporting of various municipal issues, including those related to taxi services [1].

**Methods for Filing a Complaint:**

*   **Via Phone:** Complaints can be made by calling the 1746 number within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro. For those outside the municipality, the number (21) 3460-1746 can be used [1].
*   **Via Application:** The "1746 Rio" application is available for citizens to connect with the Prefecture of Rio de Janeiro. This app allows users to request over a thousand types of public municipal information and services, and to track the progress of their requests [1].
*   **Via Website/Chat:** Complaints can also be submitted through the Taxi.Rio website, either via a chat feature or by email to taxi.rio@prefeitura.rio [2].

**Information Required for a Complaint:**
When filing a complaint, it is important to provide specific details to facilitate the investigation. These typically include:
*   The vehicle's license plate number [3].
*   The date and time of the incident [1].
*   A detailed description of the incident [1].
*   The complete address or location where the incident occurred, including any relevant references if it involves an irregular taxi stand [1].
*   If possible, the name of the taxi cooperative or association the driver belongs to [1].

**Types of Irregularities that Can Be Reported:**
The fiscalization services aim to address various infractions committed by taxi drivers. These include, but are not limited to:
*   Irregularities with the vehicle, such as poor condition, lack of mandatory inspections, or malfunctioning taximeters [1].
*   Unauthorized or clandestine taxi services (pirate taxis) [1].
*   Driver misconduct, such as overcharging (e.g., "tiro" charges), refusing or selectively picking up passengers, or other improper conduct [1].

The Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) is the municipal body responsible for regulating taxi services and ensuring compliance with applicable norms and regulations [4]. The SMTR encourages citizen participation through feedback, whether it be praise or complaints, as it is considered fundamental for service improvement [3]. The expected timeframe for addressing complaints is typically up to 15 days [1].

**Sources:**

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: taxi.rio Contact and Suggestion Channels**

For inquiries, suggestions, or complaints regarding the Taxi.Rio service, users can utilize several official channels provided by the Rio de Janeiro municipal government.

**Contact Methods:**

*   **Via the Taxi.Rio Application:** Users can contact the service directly through the application by navigating to the menu, located in the upper left corner, and selecting the "Fale conosco" (Contact Us) option [1].
*   **Via Chat:** A chat service is available directly through the Taxi.Rio website or application. By clicking the "Fale conosco" button on the bottom right of the screen, users can connect with a Taxi.Rio agent. This service operates from 9 AM to 5 PM on weekdays [1].
*   **Via Email (Ticket System):** Users can send their issues via email, after which they will receive a ticket number to track their service request [1].
*   **Via Phone:** For general inquiries, services, information, or to report issues, the official numbers for the Rio de Janeiro municipality are 1746 (within Rio de Janeiro) and (21) 3460-1746 (for other locations) [2]. These calls are charged at the cost of a landline call [3].
*   **Portal Rio 1746:** The Taxi.rio service is also accessible through the Portal Rio 1746, which serves as a central point for various municipal services [3].

**Suggestions and Feedback:**

*   The Taxi.Rio platform encourages user collaboration for service improvement. Users can submit ideas and feedback to help the city government enhance the efficiency of the Taxi.Rio service [4].
*   The "Taxista Taxi.Rio" section of the website provides a dedicated contact point for drivers to reach out for clarifications, complaints, or suggestions, advising users to first check the tutorial and FAQ sections for answers [5].

**Official Information and Support:**

*   The Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) is the municipal body responsible for regulating taxi services in Rio de Janeiro [1].
*   For specific issues related to the Taxi.Rio Cidades application, such as registration or login problems, or issues with rides, users can seek assistance through the 1746 system or the Taxi.Rio platform [1].
*   The Portal Carioca Digital also serves as a hub for various municipal services, including those related to Taxi.Rio [1].

The information is current as of August 9, 2025.

task_data.prompt: o motorista da van me cobrou 10 reais por um trajeto que sempre foi 5. ele pode fazer isso? achei um roubo!
task_data.golden_answer:
Olá! A tarifa oficial das vans do *STPL* e dos “cabritinhos” (*STPC*) está fixada em **R\$ 4,70** desde 5 de janeiro de 2025 (Decreto Rio nº 55.631/2025).
 Ele não pode cobrar R\$ 10, pois isso configura tarifa irregular.
 Você pode conferir os valores oficiais em https://transportes.prefeitura.rio/consulta-tarifa.
 Em caso de cobrança indevida, registre denúncia no 1746.

**Research Artifact: Van Transportation Fares and Regulations in Rio de Janeiro**

**Date of Search:** August 9, 2025

**Summary of Findings:**

The regulation and pricing of van transportation in Rio de Janeiro involve several municipal and state bodies, with specific fares and age limits for vehicles. The Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) is the primary municipal body responsible for regulating various transport modes, including vans operating under different systems such as the Sistema de Transporte Público Local (STPL), Transporte Especial Complementar (TEC), and Serviço de Transporte de Passageiro Complementar Comunitário (STPC), also known as "cabritinho".

 [1]**Fares:**
The fare for "Vans Municipais" is listed as R$ 4.70, managed through the Riocard Mais system. Integration [2] fares with the MetrôRio system are also established:
*   A Metrô + Van integration fare of R$ 8.80 is available for routes serving Rocinha and Vidigal when using the Cartão Jaé.
*   Another [2] integration fare of R$ 8.80 is noted for Metrô + Ônibus Integração, which can include vans, also payable with Cartão Jaé or Cartão Riocard.

It is important [3] to note that the Bilhete Único Intermunicipal (BUI), a state-level benefit, does not facilitate integration between train stations and municipal buses or municipal vans. However, the BUI [4] is mentioned in the context of intercity van fares, which saw an approximate 10% readjustment effective February 24, 2024, following an increase in intercity bus fares.

**Regulation [3] and Licensing:**
The SMTR plays a crucial role in establishing operational rules for municipal transport services. A resolution from May 2, 2024 (RESOLUÇÃO SMTR Nº 3.731) sets a lifespan of 15 years for "van" vehicles operating within the STPC ("Cabritinho") system. Vehicles entering this system must be no older than 7 years, with age calculated from the manufacturing date, provided they maintain good condition.

For the School Transport [1] Service, Decree Rio nº 47.485 (May 29, 2020) specifies that "Micro-ônibus, do Tipo 'Van'" must be no older than seven years upon entering the service and can operate for a maximum of twelve years, extendable to sixteen years if they pass INMETRO inspections.

In 2020, the city [5] government signed a decree to regulate tourist transport, impacting services like excursions and transfers, which was expected to benefit approximately ten thousand drivers. Historically, vans [2] have been a significant part of Rio de Janeiro's "transporte alternativo" (alternative transport) since the 1990s, offering a more comfortable and often faster option, especially for underserved suburban areas. The city has also seen [1] regulatory actions such as a ban on public transport vans in most of the Zona Sul (South Zone) effective April 15, 2013, with exceptions for certain communities.

Enforcement actions [6] are ongoing, with a recent operation in August 2025 targeting vans for non-compliance with regulations regarding free passage for the elderly, highlighting the importance of adhering to the Statute of the Elderly. The Department of Road [3] Transport of the State of Rio de Janeiro (DETRO-RJ) is involved in the regulation and fare adjustments for intercity van services.

The SMTR also regulates [3] other transport modalities, including buses, taxis, school transport, and chartered passenger transport. The STPL and STPC systems [6], which include vans and Kombis, comprise a significant portion of the alternative transport network, with past tenders and driver protests indicating ongoing efforts to formalize and improve these services. [5]

**Sources:**

task_data.prompt: preciso marcar a vistoria do meu taxi. como eu agendo? o que tem que levar no dia?
task_data.golden_answer:
1. Acesse https://carioca.rio/servicos/vistoria-anual-em-transporte-taxi/ (Identidade Carioca ou Gov.Br) e faça o peticionamento eletrônico. Em seguida, agende data, hora e posto em https://sgtu.rio.rj.gov.br/AgendarVistoriaSMTR/Index.
 
 Documentos para o dia (originais): DARM de vistoria; comprovante de residência (≤90 d); CRLV; certificado do taxímetro; CNH (c/ exercício de atividade); laudo de situação cadastral; apólice de seguro; certidões; certificado de curso de taxista; procuração (se for o caso). Para lista completa, consulte https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/17587796341275-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-Vistoria-Veicular-e-Atualiza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-Documental-T%C3%A1xi

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para marcar a vistoria do seu táxi no Rio de Janeiro, siga estes passos:

_Como agendar a vistoria:_
1.  Comece pelo _Portal Carioca Digital_ (carioca.rio) ou pelo sistema SGTU, buscando pelo serviço de "Vistoria Anual em Transporte Táxi".
2.  Faça login com sua Identidade Carioca ou Gov.Br.
3.  Selecione o tipo de vistoria e informe o número da permissão e placa do veículo.
4.  Envie os documentos necessários em PDF (máx. 10Mb).
5.  Após a submissão online, agende a data e hora da vistoria presencial via link fornecido.
6.  Pague a taxa (DARM de "Vistoria Anual" ou "Anual Atrasada") com _pelo menos 5 dias úteis de antecedência_.
7.  Compareça ao local agendado com a confirmação e os documentos originais.

_Documentos para levar no dia:_
_Para o permissionário:_
- CPF
- CNH válida com EAR (Exerce Atividade Remunerada)
- Certificado GNV (se aplicável)
- Comprovante de residência (cópia simples ou declaração)
- Certificado de Curso de Taxista (válido por 5 anos)

_Para o veículo:_
- CRLV atual
- Certificado do IPEM-RJ (aferição do taxímetro)
- CSV (para veículos a GNV)
- Comprovante de pagamento da taxa de vistoria (DARM)

_Importante:_ Todas as multas em atraso devem estar quitadas.

Você pode encontrar mais detalhes e o acesso ao serviço em: _carioca.rio/servicos/vistoria-anual-em-transporte-taxi/_

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Taxi Inspection Scheduling and Documentation in Rio de Janeiro**

**Date of Search:** August 9, 2025

The process for scheduling a taxi inspection (vistoria) in Rio de Janeiro involves a two-step procedure: an online application followed by an in-person visit to a designated service point [1].

**Scheduling Process:**

1.  **Online Peticionamento Eletrônico:** The process begins with an electronic petition submitted through the Portal Carioca Digital, specifically via the service page for annual taxi inspections. [1] Alternatively, scheduling can be initiated through the SGTU system. [1]
2.  **Login:** Users must log in using their Identidade Carioca or Gov.Br account to access the system. [1]
3.  **Service Selection:** The applicant needs to select the desired service, which can be a regular inspection, a delayed inspection, or an update of documentation. [1]
4.  **Information Input:** The taxi permission number and the vehicle's license plate must be provided. [1]
5.  **Document Upload:** All required documents must be uploaded in PDF format, with a maximum file size of 10 Mb. [1]
6.  **Appointment Scheduling:** After completing the online submission, a physical appointment must be scheduled through a provided link, which directs to the SGTU system for selecting a date and time. [1]
7.  **Payment of Fees:** Before the inspection, the applicant must pay the relevant fee using the Documento de Arrecadação Municipal (DARM) for "Vistoria Anual" or "Anual Atrasada." This payment must be made at least five business days prior to the scheduled inspection date.
8 [1].  **In-Person Attendance:** The authorized taxi operator (Autorizatário/Permissionário) must attend one of the SEOP/SETT service points at the scheduled date and time. They must bring the appointment confirmation and all necessary documents in their original format for verification.

**Required [1] Documents:**

The documentation required for the taxi inspection can vary slightly depending on the specific type of inspection (annual, biennial, or update) and the vehicle's age, as per resolutions from the Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR). Generally [2], the following documents are necessary:

**For the Applicant/Permissionário:**
*   Personal Identification: CPF number.
*   Permission [3] Details: Permission number and vehicle license plate.
*   Driver [3]'s License: Carteira Nacional de Habilitação (CNH) must be valid and indicate the exercise of remunerated activity.
*   GNV [1] Conversion Certificate: If the vehicle is converted to Natural Gas Vehicle (GNV), the homologation certificate from an INMETRO-accredited body must be presented and be valid.
*   Criminal [1] Record Certificates: Negative certificates from the first to fourth criminal record offices may be required if indicated in the "Laudo de Situação Cadastral".
*   Insurance [1] Policy: An insurance policy with civil liability coverage for third-party personal and material damages, along with proof of payment for overdue installments, may be required if pending in the "Laudo de Situação Cadastral".
*   Power of [1] Attorney: If the applicant is represented, a private or public power of attorney (procuração) is necessary. Digital signatures require verification of authenticity.
*   Identification [1] of Represented Person: If the applicant is a legal entity, identification of the represented person is needed.
*   Proof of [1] Address: A simple copy of proof of residence or a signed declaration of address.
*   Taxi Driver [1] Course: An updated taxi driver course certificate, valid for five years, as per CONTRAN Resolution nº 789/2020.

**For the Vehicle [2]:**
*   Vehicle Registration: Current Certificado de Registro e Licenciamento de Veículo (CRLV).
*   IPEM Certificate [3]: A current and valid certificate from the Instituto de Pesos e Medidas do Estado do Rio de Janeiro (IPEM-RJ) for taximeter calibration.
*   Vehicle Safety [3] Certificate (CSV): For GNV-powered vehicles, a valid CSV is required.
*   Proof of Payment [1]: The DARM for the inspection fee.

**For Auxiliary [1] Drivers (if applicable):**
*   CIAT: Cartão de Identificação de Auxiliar de Transporte.
*   Infraction Check [4]: A "nada consta" (no record) of infractions on the CNH/CPF and a point consultation from DETRAN-RJ, issued on the day of submission.

**Important Considerations [3]:**
*   **Outstanding Fines:** All overdue traffic fines must be settled before the inspection process can commence.
*   **Inspection Calendar [2]:** The SMTR establishes an annual calendar for taxi inspections, with specific resolutions for 2025 detailing requirements for vehicles older or newer than ten years.
*   **Service Points [2]:** Inspections are typically conducted at designated service points, such as the one located at Estrada do Guerenguê, 1630, Taquara – Jacarepaguá.
*   **Assistance:** For [1] any queries or difficulties, the municipal service center can be contacted via phone at 1746 or (21) 3460-1746. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/vistoria-anual-em-transporte-taxi/)
 - [2] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/17588268032411-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-Vistoria-de-T%C3%A1xi-1%C2%AA-Autonomia-Inclus%C3%A3o-e-Permuta-de-Ve%C3%ADculo-Transfer%C3%AAncia-de-Permiss%C3%A3o-Benef%C3%ADcio-Causa-Mortis-e-Vistoria-Extra)
 - [3] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/realizacao-consulta-e-cancelamento-de-agendamento-de-vistoria-por-permissao-em-taxi/)
 - [4] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/17587796341275-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-Vistoria-Veicular-e-Atualiza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-Documental-T%C3%A1xi)

task_data.prompt: tá na epoca da vistoria da minha van. como eu marco e o que eles olham no carro?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Para agendar a vistoria da sua van*:
 
 1. Acesse o portal de vistorias da SMTR:
  https://sgtu.rio.rj.gov.br/AgendarVistoriaSMTR/Index
 2. Selecione “Vistoria Anual Obrigatória” e preencha Placa, Renavam e CPF/CNPJ.
 3. Emita e pague o Documento de Arrecadação Municipal – DARM com antecedência mínima de ***5 dias úteis*** no mesmo portal
 4. Escolha data e horário disponíveis e confirme o agendamento.
 
 *No dia da vistoria, serão conferidos*:
 
 * Comprovante de agendamento e DARM pago
 * Certificado de Registro e Licenciamento do Veículo (CRLV) atualizado (cópia simples)
 * Laudo de Situação Cadastral e “Nada Consta” de multas (emitidos no portal)
 * Carteira Nacional de Habilitação – CNH categoria D válida (original e cópia)
 * Certificado de aferição do cronotacógrafo (original e cópia)
 * Condições básicas de segurança: pneus, freios, iluminação, cintos de segurança e extintor de incêndio válido

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para a vistoria da sua van no Rio de Janeiro, o processo é feito pelo _DETRAN RJ_.

_Como agendar:_
1.  Acesse o site oficial do _DETRAN RJ_ (www.detran.rj.gov.br).
2.  Vá na seção "Veículos" e depois em "Agendamentos".
3.  Selecione o serviço de "Vistoria".
4.  Informe os dados do veículo e do proprietário.
5.  Escolha o posto do _DETRAN_ e a data/hora disponíveis.

Para alguns serviços municipais, o agendamento pode ser feito por um portal municipal, e o pagamento da taxa deve ser feito com no mínimo 5 dias úteis de antecedência.

_O que é verificado na vistoria:_
A inspeção verifica a segurança, conformidade e identificação do veículo. Eles olham:
- _Identificação_: chassi, motor, etiquetas.
- _Segurança e Equipamentos_: faróis, luzes de freio, setas, limpadores, buzina, cintos de segurança, extintor, triângulo, macaco.
- _Condição Mecânica_: pneus, suspensão, freios.
- _Emissões_: nível de poluentes.
- _Alterações_: se houve modificações (cor, tipo de combustível, etc.) e se estão regularizadas.

Você precisa levar:
- _Identidade com foto (RG ou CNH)_.
- _CPF_.
- _CRLV (Certificado de Registro e Licenciamento do Veículo)_.
- _Comprovante de pagamento das taxas_.
- _Confirmação do agendamento_.

A taxa para uma vistoria em trânsito é de _R$ 207,64_.

Precisa de ajuda para encontrar o site do _DETRAN RJ_ ou tem mais alguma dúvida sobre os documentos?

**Research Artifact: Vistoria Veicular in Rio de Janeiro - Scheduling and Verified Items**

**Date of Search:** August 9, 2025

Vehicle inspections (vistoria veicular) in Rio de Janeiro are conducted by the DETRAN RJ (Department of Traffic of the State of Rio de Janeiro) and potentially by municipal bodies, depending on the service. The process for scheduling and the items verified vary slightly based on the type of inspection.

**Scheduling a Vehicle Inspection:**

The primary method for scheduling vehicle inspections in Rio de Janeiro is through the official DETRAN RJ website [1]. The steps generally involve:
1.  Accessing the DETRAN RJ website (www.detran.rj.gov.br) [1].
2.  Navigating to the "Veículos" (Vehicles) section and then to "Agendamentos" (Appointments). [1]
3.  Selecting the "Vistoria" (Inspection) service and specifying the reason (e.g., transfer, alteration). [1]
4.  Providing the necessary vehicle and owner details, such as license plate and RENAVAM. [2]
5.  Choosing a convenient DETRAN unit and available date and time. [1]
6.  Confirming the appointment and saving the confirmation. [1]

For certain municipal services, such as the "Vistoria Anual Obrigatória" or "Vistoria de Inclusão Veículo," scheduling may be done through a municipal portal, requiring the input of specific vehicle data and an advance payment of fees. It [2] is noted that for municipal services, fees must be paid at least 5 business days prior to the inspection.

It [2] is also possible to reschedule or cancel existing appointments through the DETRAN RJ portal.

* [1]*Documents Required for Inspection:**

When attending a scheduled vehicle inspection, individuals must present:
*   A valid photo identification document (e.g., RG or CNH).
*  [1]  CPF (Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas).
*   [1] CRLV (Certificado de Registro e Licenciamento do Veículo).
*   Proof [1] of payment for relevant fees.
*   The [1] appointment confirmation.
*   For [1] vehicle transfers, the filled and signed DUT (Documento Único de Transferência) is also required.
*   If [1] representing another person, a power of attorney and the owner's documents are necessary.

**Items [1] Verified During Vehicle Inspection:**

Vehicle inspections are designed to ensure the vehicle's safety, compliance with regulations, and proper identification. The key areas checked include:

*   **Identification:** Authenticity of the vehicle's identification numbers (chassis, engine), vehicle labels, and markings on windows.
*   **Safety [1] and Equipment:** Functionality and condition of mandatory safety equipment such as headlights (high and low beams), brake lights, reverse lights, license plate lights, turn signals, mirrors, windshield wipers, horn, and seat belts. The presence [1] and condition of a fire extinguisher, warning triangle, jack, and lug wrench are also verified.
*   **Mechanical [1] Condition:** The state of the tires, including wear levels, is assessed. Suspension [1] and brake systems are also checked for proper functioning and safety.
*   **Emissions [1]:** Levels of pollutants emitted by the vehicle are measured.
*   **Alterations [1]:** Any modifications made to the vehicle's original characteristics, such as changes in color, category, brand/model, dimensions (height, weight, length, width), power, or fuel type, are verified for authorization and regularization. Vehicles [1] with GNV (Gas Natural Veicular) installations require an annual Certificate of Vehicle Safety (CSV). Blindage [1] must be documented and free from wear.

**Services [2] Requiring Vehicle Inspection at DETRAN RJ:**

A vehicle inspection is mandatory for several services processed by DETRAN RJ, including:
*   Change of ownership or company name.
*   Rectification [1] of vehicle data.
*   Transfer [1] of ownership, jurisdiction, or municipality.
*   Issuance [1] of a second copy of the Vehicle Registration Certificate (CRV).
*   Alteration [1] of vehicle characteristics (e.g., color, fuel type, body modifications).
*   Plate [1] changes, including the adoption of the Mercosul standard plate.

The cost [1] for a "Vistoria em Trânsito" (Inspection in Transit) is R$ 207.64. Fees for [3] other DETRAN RJ services are paid via DUDA (Documento Único de Arrecadação) or other authorized payment methods. [4]

Olá! Para reclamar sobre a falta de acessibilidade em ônibus no Rio de Janeiro, o canal oficial da Prefeitura é o _Portal Rio 1746_.

Você pode registrar sua queixa das seguintes formas:

*   _Telefone:_ Ligue para _1746_ (dentro do Rio de Janeiro) ou _(21) 3460-1746_ (de outras localidades).
*   _Online:_ Acesse o site _1746.rio_ ou use o aplicativo _1746 Rio_.

Ao registrar sua reclamação, forneça o máximo de detalhes possível, como:
- _Número da linha do ônibus_.
- _Data e hora_ da ocorrência.
- _Número de identificação do ônibus_ (número do carro), se souber.

Sua denúncia será encaminhada para a _Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR)_.

**Research Topic:** Reclamar falta de acessibilidade em ônibus no Rio de Janeiro

To report issues related to lack of accessibility on buses in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the official channels provided by the municipal government. The primary platform for such complaints is the **Portal Rio 1746**. [1] This portal allows for the reporting of various issues concerning bus services, including those related to accessibility. [2]

**How to File a Complaint:**

*   **Portal Rio 1746:** This is the central hub for citizen services in Rio de Janeiro. Complaints can be submitted through its website, application, or by phone. [1]
    *   **Phone:** Dial 1746 within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro, or (21) 3460-1746 from other locations. These calls are charged at the rate of a landline call. [1]
    *   **Website/App:** The 1746 Rio app and website allow users to submit and track service requests. [1]
*   **Specific Information for Complaints:** When reporting a lack of accessibility, it is helpful to provide specific details such as the bus line number, the date of the observation, and the bus's identification number (car number) if available. [2] For general service issues, the complaint should include the protocol number of a previous request if applicable. [3]

**Relevant Municipal Bodies:**

*   **Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR):** This secretariat is responsible for improving the quality of public passenger transport in Rio de Janeiro and regulates various transport modes, including buses. [1] Complaints lodged through the 1746 channels are forwarded to the SMTR for investigation and potential notification to the bus companies. [2]
*   **Ouvidoria (Ombudsman):** The SMTR has an Ouvidoria that can be contacted for issues related to transport services. [1] The general municipal ombudsman services are also accessible via the 1746 channels. [2]

**Other Potential Avenues:**

*   **Ministério Público Estadual:** In cases of persistent lack of accessibility, the State Public Prosecutor's Office can be approached to ensure the rights of people with disabilities are upheld.
* [4]   **Agência Nacional de Transportes Terrestres (ANTT):** While the ANTT deals with national transport regulations, for local bus issues in Rio de Janeiro, municipal channels are more direct.

The [5] Portal Rio 1746 aims to address issues such as the functioning or absence of elevators for wheelchair users, as well as other technical standards of buses. The [2] typical response time for complaints submitted through the 1746 system is up to 10 days for specific service verifications. [2]

To file a complaint regarding bus line 474 in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the official channels provided by the municipal government. The primary platform for lodging complaints, suggestions, and seeking information about public transport is the **Portal Rio 1746** [1]. This portal allows users to report various issues related to bus services, including poor vehicle condition, driver misconduct, and service irregularities [1].

**Methods for Filing a Complaint:**

*   **Central 1746:** Complaints can be made by calling the central number 1746 within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro. For those outside the municipality, the number (21) 3460-1746 can be used [1].
*   **1746 Rio App:** The 1746 Rio mobile application is available for citizens to submit requests and track their progress [1].
*   **Portal Rio 1746 Website:** The Portal Rio 1746 website also facilitates the submission of complaints and requests [2].

**Information Required for a Complaint:**

When filing a complaint, it is advisable to provide specific details to ensure effective processing. For issues related to the condition of a bus, the following information is typically required:
*   The bus line number [1].
*   The date of the observation [1].
*   The bus's order number (if available) [1].

For complaints regarding driver misconduct, additional details such as the exact time and location of the incident, and a precise account of the occurrence are beneficial [3].

**Process and Response:**

Complaints submitted through these channels are forwarded to the relevant departments, such as the Municipal Secretariat of Transport (SMTR), for investigation and action [1]. The typical response time for a complaint is up to 10 business days [1]. The municipal government uses these complaints to monitor service quality and take necessary measures, including notifying companies and applying penalties if irregularities are found [1].

**Other Relevant Channels:**

*   **Secretariat of Transport (SMTR):** The SMTR also has an online service channel for inquiries and complaints, where users can submit requests via a form on their website [3].
*   **Rio Ônibus:** The "Rio Ônibus" website provides a "Fale Conosco" (Contact Us) section where users can submit complaints about bus lines or companies.

The **Ouvidoria** (Ombudsman) of the Secretariat of Transport (SMTR) is also a point of contact for user complaints. The [1] **AGETRANSP** (State Agency for Public Transport Regulation) also has an ombudsman service, but it is generally for state-level transport, such as trains and subways. For [1] bus-related issues within the municipality, the 1746 channels and SMTR are the primary official resources.

- _Aplicativo 1746 Rio_: Baixe o app e registre por lá.
- _Site Portal Rio 1746_: Acesse www.1746.rio e faça sua reclamação.

Ao registrar, informe o _número da linha (474)_, a _data_ e, se possível, o _número de ordem do ônibus_. Sua reclamação será encaminhada à Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) para fiscalização.

task_data.prompt: se eu pegar um onibus e depois o brt, eu pago uma passagem só com o bilhete unico? como funciona a integração?
task_data.golden_answer:
Sim. Com o Bilhete Único Carioca, ao pegar um ônibus e depois o BRT dentro de até 3 horas, você paga apenas uma passagem.
 *Regras principais:*
 
 * Intervalo de integração: até 3 horas entre o 1º e 2º validador.
 * Tarifa para Ônibus + BRT: R\$ 4,30.
 * Limite: até 2 integrações diárias.
 
 Mais detalhes: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10870203087515-Valores-das-tarifas-de-ônibus-e-integrações

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Sim, com o Bilhete Único Carioca (BUC) ou o Bilhete Único Intermunicipal (BUI), você pode fazer a integração entre ônibus e BRT pagando uma tarifa única.

*   Para o _Bilhete Único Carioca (BUC)_: você pode realizar até _3 viagens integradas_ dentro de um período de _3 horas_, desde que _uma das viagens seja no BRT_.
*   Para o _Bilhete Único Intermunicipal (BUI)_: permite até _2 viagens por dia_ em um intervalo de _3 horas_, com uma tarifa máxima de _R$ 8,55_, incluindo BRT e outros transportes.

O cartão _Jaé_ é o principal para o transporte municipal (BUC), e o _Riocard Mais_ é usado para o BUI. Ambos são aceitos na integração.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Integration of BRT with Bilhete Único in Rio de Janeiro**

**Date of Search:** August 9, 2025

The Bus Rapid Transit (BRT) system in Rio de Janeiro is integrated with the Bilhete Único Carioca (BUC), a municipal fare benefit that allows passengers to make multiple trips within a specified time frame. Additionally [1], the BRT is also included in the scope of the Bilhete Único Intermunicipal (BUI), a state-level benefit.

 [2]**Bilhete Único Carioca (BUC) and BRT Integration:**
The Bilhete Único Carioca is a municipal fare benefit valid for travel on urban buses, BRTs, VLTs, and local urban transport services within the city of Rio de Janeiro. With [1] the BUC, passengers can make up to three integrated trips, provided that one of these trips is on the BRT. This integration is valid within a three-hour period from the initial validation of the card. Previously [1], only two integrations were allowed under the BUC rules. The [1] BUC system is managed by the municipal government, with the "Jaé" card being the primary card for municipal transport, including BRT, VLT, and vans.

**Bilhete [2] Único Intermunicipal (BUI) and BRT Integration:**
The Bilhete Único Intermunicipal (BUI) is a state-level benefit that allows eligible users to make up to two trips per day within a three-hour window, with at least one intermunicipal transport mode included, for a maximum fare of R$ 8.55. The state government subsidizes the difference between this capped fare and the actual cost of the transport. The BUI [2] is valid across various transport modes, including BRT, VLT, buses (municipal and intermunicipal), vans (intermunicipal), metro, trains, and ferries. To use [2] the BUI, individuals must meet specific age (between 5 and 64 years) and income criteria (monthly income up to R$ 3,205.20, as per a judicial decision in June 2023). The Riocard [2] Mais card is used for the BUI benefit, and it continues to be accepted on municipal transport for those who have the BUI benefit enabled.

**Recent [2] Developments and Proposed Integration:**
In August 2025, the Prefeitura do Rio announced plans for a "BRT Metropolitano" project, which aims to integrate bus services from the Baixada Fluminense with the city's BRT system. This initiative includes the construction of the Terminal Margaridas in Irajá, which will serve as a connection point for buses from the Baixada to the BRT. Alongside [3] this, a proposal for a "Bilhete Único Metropolitano" (BUM) was put forth, intended to create a unified fare system for the entire Metropolitan Region, integrating municipal and state transport modes. This new [3] terminal and integration are projected to reduce travel times significantly and offer a more affordable fare for commuters between the Baixada Fluminense and Rio de Janeiro. The operation [3] of the Terminal Margaridas is anticipated for the first semester of 2026.

**Card Usage [4] Clarification:**
While the "Jaé" card is now the primary card for municipal transport in Rio, the Riocard Mais card remains essential for those utilizing the Bilhete Único Intermunicipal (BUI) benefit, as it continues to be accepted on municipal transport for BUI holders and on state-level transport. For travel [2] that does not involve integration and requires separate payments, users might need to carry both the Riocard for state services and the Jaé card for municipal services. [5]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/transportes/passageiro-que-usar-o-brt-ganhara-mais-uma-integracao-com-o-bilhete-unico-carioca-2/)
 - [2] [riobilheteunico.com.br](https://site.riobilheteunico.com.br/)
 - [3] [diariodorio.com](https://diariodorio.com/prefeitura-do-rio-anuncia-integracao-do-brt-com-a-baixada-e-quer-novo-bilhete-unico/)
 - [4] [temporealrj.com](https://temporealrj.com/paes-anuncia-integracao-do-brt-com-a-baixada-e-propoe-novo-bilhete-unico-metropolitano/)
 - [5] [riobilheteunico.com.br](https://site.riobilheteunico.com.br/bilhete-unico-intermunicipal/)

 *Para habilitar o Bilhete Único Intermunicipal (BUI), siga estes passos:*
 
 * Tenha um cartão Riocard Mais Expresso ou Vale-Transporte; se não tiver, adquira em loja Riocard Mais (endereços em https://ondeestamos.riocardmais.com.br)
 * Cadastre-se em *https://www.riocardmais.com.br* e registre seu cartão

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para solicitar o _Bilhete Único Intermunicipal_, que é um benefício do Governo do Estado do Rio de Janeiro, o processo é feito online.

_Quem pode solicitar:_
- Pessoas de 5 a 64 anos.
- Renda mensal de até _R$ 3.205,20_.

_Como solicitar online:_
1.  Tenha um cartão _Riocard Mais_ e uma conta no site. Se não tiver, cadastre-se em _cartaoriocard.com.br/paraVoce_.
2.  Acesse o site do Bilhete Único em _www.riobilheteunico.com.br/declaracao_ e faça a sua declaração de renda.
3.  Faça login com seus dados _Riocard Mais_.
4.  Se já tiver um cartão, vá em "Usuários", "Consulta e Alteração", selecione seu nome, clique em "Alterar" e marque a opção "Deseja habilitar o Bilhete Único Intermunicipal?".
5.  Se for cadastrar um cartão novo, clique em "Cadastrar Cartão" e selecione "Habilitar BUI".

A ativação pode levar até 48 horas. Não é preciso ir a um local específico para a solicitação inicial, tudo é feito pela internet.
